name: Rainbow Airschool Ladysmith
about: Rainbow Air School, based at Ladysmith Airport, was established in 2006 with a strong focus on recreational aviation. We pride ourselves on an excellent safety record and a passion for making flying accessible and enjoyable. Our training programs include Light Sports, Microlight/Ultralight, and Instructor Ratings. With a dedicated team, we ensure a comprehensive and safe learning environment for all our students. Our mission is to provide high-quality flight training while fostering a love for aviation. We are committed to helping our students achieve their flying goals.
